title.value: Телязиоз крупного рогатого скота и меры борьбы с ним
Thelaziosis of cattle and measures of disease control

organization.name: Vitebsk State Academy of Veterinary Medicine

person.name: Nakhaenko, A.V., Vitebsk State Academy of Veterinary Medicine (Belarus)

organization.name: Vitebsk State Academy of Veterinary Medicine (Belarus)

abstract.value: The monograph deals with thelaziosis of cattle in animal husbandry enterprises of the Republic of Belarus. The spread of thelaziosis conjunctival keratitis in cattle farms, hematological and immune -biochemical status of cattle with thelaziosis conjunctival keratitis is analyzed. New means of thelaziosis therapy along with general assumptions and basic principles of drug therapy are suggested. Screening of anthelmintics is made. Effectiveness of different veterinary substances is analyzed; comparative effectiveness of symptomatic agents is evaluated. Medicinal complications of animals infested with telyazia and the general principles of their elimination are outlined. Flies and control measures, drugs and their dosage forms that are used to flies control are researched. Plants with insecticidal action are enumerated; collection, drying and storage of medicinal plants is analyzed. Mechanization used for the treatment of animals along with classification of mechanization means is evaluated. Preparation of emulsions ( solutions) and insecticides ( insect repellents ) is described.
